properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Mona Passage Southward to 17N; Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 9:27PM AST until February 7 at 2:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...HAZARDOUS MARINE CONDITIONS EXPECTED BY THURSDAY MORNING...

.Increasing seas and winds will deteriorate marine conditions by
Thursday and through the weekend.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
6 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Atlantic offshore waters of Puerto Rico and USVI,
coastal waters of northern Puerto Rico and the Mona Passage.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Thursday to 2 PM AST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As winds and seas increase hazardous
marine conditions will spread across the rest of the local
waters through the weekend. Stay tuned for more details.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THURSDAY TO 2 PM AST FRIDAY
